Text: Please, can someone tell me how to play this on my xbox360. im noob on this stuff. help my- cant i just download the game then put it in my xbox harddrive thorough USB?
You need to flash your xbox, google ixtreme

there is a guy on these posts will flash your xbox if you dont feel comfortable doing it yourself, pay 20 or 30quid then dl abgx and your set to play any xbox game you want even on xbox live.  i got mine done and have like 40games now.  its superb.
